data.title: Unbelievable Adventures of Italians in Russia
data.meta_description:
Alfurat is concerned in the distribution of Arabic books throughout the Arab Word as well as Internationally. We collect, store, and progressively build a database of Arabic words which we make most of it available on our website.
            Currently, our database consists of 120000 Arabic titles including authors, distributors, publishers, a short description and a cover image. We are also particularly specialized in rare Arabic books, magazines, manuscripts, prints, posters.
           الفرات مؤسسة تعنى بتوزيع الكتاب العربي و المجلات الثقافية العربية. نحن نقوم برصد إصدارات الكتب في لبنان وبعض البلدان العربية وإعداد قوائم بها وعرضها على موقعنا الإلكتروني. لدينا بنك معلومات لـ 120000 ألف كتاب عربي يتضمن: إسم المؤلف، عنوان الكتاب، دار النشر، الموضوع الأساسي و الفرعي للكتاب وصورة الغلاف.
data.text:
Al-Furat Publishing and Distribution, in partnership with Uruk Books, is a digital library with over 150,000 titles. We promptly add the latest releases, including magazines and posters, to our collection.

We offer global shipping and secure payment methods.

Our platform streamlines the search and purchase process, ensuring direct order security. Additionally, users can access daily and weekly discounts for enhanced affordability in literary pursuits.
